document_data.caption: ''Pelendralaar and [[Kya Mordrayn]]''
document_data.name: Pelendralaar
document_data.mainbody: '''Pelendralaar''' was a [[dracolich]] in league with the [[Cult of the Dragon]] sought to gain control of all of [[Faerûn]] by corrupting the [[Mythal]] of [[Myth Drannor]].
document_data.Description: In life, Pelendralaar was a [[red dragon]].
document_data.Relationships: His partner was [[Kya Mordrayn]], a powerful [[sorceress]] who operated a cell of the Cult of the Dragon.
document_data.History: In [[1369 DR]], the dracolich aided by the Cult of the Dragon tried to spread corruption to the Mythals of Myth Drannor and gain control of the cities of Faerûn.
